entry.title: Docker History
entry.summary: Building an Apache2 Docker container from Docker File Dockerfile FROM ubuntu:18.04 LABEL "Project"="LilFasion" ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive RUN apt update RUN apt install apache2 -y WORKDIR /var/www/html #COPY lilfasion.tar.gz /var/www/html ADD lilfasion.tar.gz /var/www/html CMD ["/usr/sbin/apache2ctl", "-D", "FOREGROUND"] RUN service apache2 restart VOLUME /var/log/apache2 EXPOSE 80 ...
